definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: I hadn't paid the telephone bill.
My guess is that the garbage collector spends a considerable amount of time with collecting memory.
sentences.chinese: 我猜测垃圾回收器话费了相当多的时间去回收内存。

sentences.english: Every time I go to pay calls always line up, never less than automatic payment machine.
sentences.chinese: 每次去交话费总是排队，从来不到自动交款机。

sentences.english: I refuse to pay for this call.
sentences.chinese: 所以我拒绝付这个电话费。

sentences.english: Rural customers tend to spend less on their monthly phone bills.
sentences.chinese: 农村的用户总是考虑每月能够少花一些话费。

sentences.english: Water is free, but you will have to pay for electricity and telephone calls.
sentences.chinese: 水是免费的，但你必须得交电钱，和电话费。

sentences.english: Without voice advertising, unnecessary cost for domestic calls in Japan can be saved.
sentences.chinese: 没有语音广告，可节省日本国内的不必要的通话费。

sentences.english: It costs five cents and I don't have it. But look.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至连五分钱的电话费都付不起，但是你看。

sentences.english: Nearly all airtime in Africa is pre-paid.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲，移动电话通话费用都是预付的。

sentences.english: After we paid the phone bill there is little left in the kitty.
sentences.chinese: 付掉电话费后，公共储金里剩下的钱不够了。

sentences.english: To bring this into order, it would take them two to three months.
sentences.chinese: 为了让自己的工作有所成就，得话费他们两到三个月。

sentences.english: The modules account for 65% of the cost of a solar installation.
sentences.chinese: 这些组件占了太阳能装置百分之65%的话费。

sentences.english: Ginny's mom sighed and figured the bill hadn't been paid.
sentences.chinese: 金妮的妈妈叹气连连，猜想肯定是电话费没交。

sentences.english: A fixed part of all phone fees would be dedicated to investment in broadband networks.
sentences.chinese: 所有电话费的固定部分将致力于在宽带网络的投资。

sentences.english: Their phone ha been cut off because they haven't paid the bill .
sentences.chinese: 因为没交电话费，他们的电话被停机了。

sentences.english: If use maritime satellite phone, the telephone bill is minutely be about 15 dollars.
sentences.chinese: 若使用海事卫星电话，通话费每分钟就要15美元。

definition: to be in arrears/to be out of credit/amount owing
to make a long distance call
Personal Handy-phone System (PHS), mobile network system operating in China 1998-2013, branded "Little Smart"
online banking/abbr. for 網上銀行|网上银行[wang3 shang4 yin2 hang2]
money wrapped in red as a gift/bonus payment/kickback/bribe
